article: All over the world people enjoy sports. Sports are  good for  people's health. Many people like to watch  others  play sports games. They buy tickets  _  turn on their TV sets to  watch  them. Sports  _  with the seasons. People play  different  games in different seasons. Sometimes they play inside the room. Sometimes they play outside. We can  _  sports here and there. Some sports are rather interesting,  _  people everywhere like them. Football, for example, is very popular in the world. Sometimes people  _  different countries cannot understand each other, but after a game they often become very  friendly  to each other.
